analytics.post_content: These icons and text are fully customizable and can be placed anywhere on the page as it's a widget. Have the freedom to customize without touching code.

customer-service.post_content: Rest easy knowing real people are ready to help you. Everyone on our award-winning Customer Care team is an experienced Marketify user.

human-reviews.post_content: We've meticulously reviewed Marketify to ensure its as bug free as possible. There's nothing is quite as fulfilling than making sure it just works.

fully-responsive.post_content: Marketify is mobile-friendly with responsive functionality that allows users to fully utilize your website whatever the device.

fast-setup.post_content: Famous for it’s five minute install, WordPress may be the part that takes the longest – installing the plugins and Marketify is fast and easy.

frontend-submissions.post_content: Want to allow users to submit their own products and earn a percentage of each sale just like ThemeForest? Marketify makes this easy!
